text: Luiz Pinguelli Rosa (19 February 1942 â€“ 3 March 2022) was a Brazilian nuclear scientist. He was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He was a researcher and professor at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro. He was also scientifically and politically active in the field of nuclear energy. Rosa died on 3 March 2022 at a hospital in Copacabana, Brazil at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Academics of the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro Category:Scientists from Rio de Janeiro
title: Luiz Pinguelli Rosa
